1.name: Blade Runner
1.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

2.name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
2.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

3.name: The Thing
3.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

4.name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
4.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

5.name: Querelle
5.description: French sailor Querelle arrives in Brest and starts frequenting a strange whorehouse. He discovers that his brother Robert is the lover of the lady owner, Lysiane. Here, you can play dice ...                See full summary »

6.name: Poltergeist
6.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

7.name: First Blood
7.description: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.

8.name: Conan the Barbarian
8.description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

9.name: Annie
9.description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

10.name: Rocky III
10.description: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

11.name: Gandhi
11.description: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

12.name: Sophie's Choice
12.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust. They befriend Stingo, the ...                See full summary »

13.name: TRON
13.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

14.name: The Dark Crystal
14.description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

15.name: Sorceress
15.description: Sword and sorcery story of the cosmic struggle between white magic and black magic.

16.name: Grease 2
16.description: An English student at a 1960s American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

17.name: 48 Hrs.
17.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

18.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
18.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

19.name: Tootsie
19.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

20.name: The Secret of NIMH
20.description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

21.name: The Last American Virgin
21.description: The friendship of a group of young friends struggling with teen sex, drugs, and work is jeopardized by a romantic interest which may turn pals into bitter rivals.

22.name: The Beastmaster
22.description: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

23.name: Cat People
23.description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

24.name: Pink Floyd: The Wall
24.description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

25.name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
25.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

26.name: Butterfly
26.description: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.

27.name: Fanny och Alexander
27.description: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

28.name: The Verdict
28.description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

29.name: Creepshow
29.description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

30.name: The World According to Garp
30.description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

31.name: Friday the 13th Part III
31.description: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

32.name: The King of Comedy
32.description: Aspiring comic Rupert Pupkin attempts to achieve success in show business by stalking his idol, a late night talk-show host who just craves his privacy.

33.name: Zapped!
33.description: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

34.name: The Year of Living Dangerously
34.description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

35.name: Summer Lovers
35.description: A young American couple and a French woman engage in a threesome in the Greek Islands.

36.name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
36.description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

37.name: Swamp Thing
37.description: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

38.name: Airplane II: The Sequel
38.description: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

39.name: The Last Unicorn
39.description: A brave unicorn and a magician fight an evil King who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.

40.name: Tenebre
40.description: An American writer in Rome is stalked by a serial killer bent on harassing him while killing all people associated with his work on his latest book.

41.name: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
41.description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

42.name: Fitzcarraldo
42.description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

43.name: Basket Case
43.description: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed Siamese-twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

44.name: Silent Rage
44.description: A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a mute maniacal murderer who, as the result of years of medical experimentation, has the ability to self-heal.

45.name: Victor Victoria
45.description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

46.name: Forbidden World
46.description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

47.name: The Plague Dogs
47.description: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

48.name: Evil Under the Sun
48.description: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot (Sir Peter Ustinov) to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

49.name: Night Shift
49.description: A morgue attendant is talked into running a brothel at his workplace after a deceased pimp is sent there. However, the pimp's killers don't look too kindly on this new 'business', nor does the morgue's owner.

50.name: Death Wish II
50.description: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.
